column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: earthquakes. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix eq: <http://www.example.org/ontology/earthquake#> .eq:Earthquake a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Earthquake"@en .eq:hasMagnitude a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain eq:Earthquake ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "has magnitude"@en .eq:hasEpicenter a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain eq:Earthquake ;    rdfs:range eq:Location ;    rdfs:label "has epicenter"@en .eq:Location a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Location"@en .eq:latitude a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain eq:Location ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "latitude"@en .eq:longitude a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain eq:Location ;    rdfs:range xsd:decimal ;    rdfs:label "longitude"@en .eq:hasOccurredAt a owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain eq:Earthquake ;    rdfs:range xsd:dateTime ;    rdfs:label "has occurred at"@en .```This ontology describes concepts related to earthquakes. It includes classes for 'Earthquake' and 'Location', as well as properties related to each. 'hasMagnitude' is a datatype property describing the magnitude of an earthquake. 'hasEpicenter' is an object property relating an earthquake to its epicenter location. 'latitude' and 'longitude' are datatype properties describing the coordinates of a location. 'hasOccurredAt' is a datatype property indicating when the earthquake occurred.
